name: Chipsse Solid 3
description:
Chipsse Solid 3 is a work sharing a great deal of visions different, in a fantastic world on the edge of the abyss to threaten by time and the people Chipsse Solid our favorite ninja cannot escape has this malefic whirlwind and will have other choice no than to beat it, to become a man to be so able to keep what have him the most precious.

Treason, suffering, pain, fear, promise, choice, confidence, enjoyment, strength, condolence prepare you for a new adventure as you will never have seen it somewhere else, our RPG will plunge you undoubtedly into a great adventure with a big A of more than 200 hours of games.

Chipsse Solid 3 will propose to you a totally new version of the RPG, it will be a real wind of freshness for the connoisseurs on the subject !
